name: IsClopen.continuous_indicator
initialProofState:
Î± : Type u_1
Î² : Type u_2
instâœÂ² : TopologicalSpace Î±
instâœÂ¹ : TopologicalSpace Î²
f : Î± â†’ Î²
s : Set Î±
instâœ : Zero Î²
hs : IsClopen s
hf : Continuous f
âŠ¢ Continuous (s.indicator f)
decl:
@[to_additive]
lemma IsClopen.continuous_mulIndicator (hs : IsClopen s) (hf : Continuous f) :
    Continuous (s.mulIndicator f) :=
  hf.mulIndicator (by simp [isClopen_iff_frontier_eq_empty.mp hs])
